articles.author: Larry Monserate Piojo, PCIJ/PCP
articles.title: Terminal: The constant agony of commuting amid the pandemic - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: “Commuting” is synonymous with the word “agony” for 13 million residents of Metro Manila, the nation’s capital region. Going to the workplace from home and back has been a constant source of distress for millions of Filipinos in one of Asia's most congested m…
articles.content: Thousands of commuters pack bus stops and other transport stations, enduring long and exhausting queues across Metro Manila, after the government imposes a 30-day Luzon-wide lockdown or 'community qu… [+4836 chars]

articles.title: Repeat offender? Woman who refused to wear mask in MBS has pending charge over similar offence - AsiaOne
